thread.title: UAE traffic: Accident on Dubai-Al Ain road causes congestion
thread.title_full: UAE traffic: Accident on Dubai-Al Ain road causes congestion

title: UAE traffic: Accident on Dubai-Al Ain road causes congestion
text: (KT file photo) More details on the accident are being awaited The Dubai Police earlier on Monday has alerted morning motorists of an accident that has occurred on Dubai-Al Ain Road going towards Dubai. As of writing, the accident is still in place with local authorities ensuring order and safe removal of the accident to resume normal traffic operations to those on their way to work. According to the Dubai Police's tweet, the accident occurred just past Dubai's Outlet Mall. 07:09An #accident on Dubai - AlAin Rd. after Outlet Mall toward #Dubai , kindly take caution and have a safe journey. #TrafficUpdate - Dubai Police???? ??? (@DubaiPoliceHQ) February 20, 2017 More details on the accident are being awaited Apart from this, motorists inbound to Dubai from Sharjah can expect massive slowdown on both the E11 Dubai-Sharjah Road and Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Road.
